forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 4pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. South southwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 17, with temperatures rising to around 22 overnight. West wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 27, with temperatures falling to around 25 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 16. West southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers before 3pm, then a chance of snow showers and patchy blowing snow. Cloudy. High near 33, with temperatures falling to around 30 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Blowing Snow then Chance Snow Showers And Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow before 7pm, then a chance of snow showers and patchy blowing snow between 7pm and 1am, then patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 14, with temperatures rising to around 17 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -3. West wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: There was a tree down blocking most of the trail at around 3:30.  Marv, Vasili and I cleared most of it. Otherwise, the trail in the woods was great, pretty fast. No connector. Had to walk across the golf course

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 7 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.comments: Pintail peak and the Big Terrain Park are now open! Only the glades are closed this morning.  Conditions should be very good today the couple of inches of snow from yesterday was tilled into the base. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is navy bean and ham. NASTAR racing begins at 12:30 on Birch Run. The XC trails will be power-tilled this morning. The snowshoe trails are open. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
